short_summary: The Public Health Agency of Canada requires a Contractor to provide information and data on the paediatric population at multiple hospital sites in Canada.
description: The Public Health Agency of Canada requires a Contractor to provide information and data on the paediatric population at multiple hospital sites in Canada. There are four different surveillance streams, their respective case definitions, variables and deliverables are outlined in Appendices A to D of the Statement of Work. Up to four contracts may be awarded as a result of this bid solicitation, one contract for each stream.
full_summary:
## Paediatric Data
  *Registration Details:*
    * **Tender Title:** Paediatric Data
    * **Tender Reference:** WS3236296480-Doc4074921643
    * **Publication Date:** 28 June 2023
    * **Closing Date and Time (UTC-5):** 11 August 2023, 14:00:00

  *Documentation Details:*
    * **Annex Numbers:** 4  
    * **Solicitation Number:** WS3236296480  
    * **Document Date:** 31 July 2023
    * **Contract Commencement Date:** 02 October 2023  
    * **Contract Completion Date:** 30 June 2027  
    * **Tender Status:** Expired

  *Competition Details:*
    * **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
    * **Competition Method:** Competitive – Open bidding
    * **Selection Criteria: Lowest Cost-per-Point**

  *Procurement Details:*
    * **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
    * **Procurement Method:** Competitive – Open bidding
    * **Trade Agreements:**
		+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
		+ Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
		+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

  *End-User Details:*
    * **End-User Entity:** Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC)
    * **Address:** 130 Colonnade Road, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada, K1A 0K9

  *Point of Contact:*
    * **Contact Name:** Diane Reynolds
    * **Contact Email:** [diane.reynolds@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:diane.reynolds@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

  *Additional Information:*
    * The Public Health Agency of Canada is seeking information and data on the paediatric population for various hospital sites in Canada.  
    * Four contracts may be awarded, one for each surveillance stream.
    * The specifications and details of the project can be found in the Statement of Work.
    * Tenders must be submitted through the Discovery website at the URL below.
    * Failure to comply may lead to rejection of adverse consequences.



[Notice URL](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16717197?extsite=MTY3
